Control Name: Creates Baseline Configuration of IT Technology—A baseline configuration of IT and control systems is created and maintained.

control_attributes.Control: Creates Baseline Configuration of IT Technology—A baseline configuration of IT and control systems is created and maintained.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC8.1 The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, configures, documents, tests, approves, and implements changes to infrastructure, data, software, and procedures to meet its objectives.
